title: Salt v1.2.9.5
description:
"Salt is a game based around exploration and adventure where you sail across a vast ocean exploring different islands. The world of Salt is procedurally generated, providing you with an endless amount of exploration. During your adventure you will meet various challenges and obstacles that you will have to overcome, as well as discovering the real story behind the world of Salt. You will fight pirates, hunt animals for food, defend yourself from enemies at night, sail the ocean waves, craft items from resources you find throughout the world, and discover mysterious places throughout your adventure."
More info at https://saltthegame.com/pages/saltoverview/

v1.2.9.5 changelog:
- Fixed a bug that would allow you to cast miltiple fishing lines at once.
- Deer now always drop guts.
- Merchant music no longer loops.
- Updated swing animations on a number of handheld items.
- Improved hit boxes on pirates.
- Increased the size of the wheel on the Pardon Pusher.
- Increased the distance needed to activane the loot windiw auto-close.
- Named captains now have a 100% chance to drop a silver key.
- Pirates are now less likely to run into their own flags.
- Weight on items now only affects sprinting speed.
- Increased most respawn times on resources, enemies, and animals.
- Reduced the chance that pirates would spawn inside structures.
- Pirates no longer do damage with their axe swings after they have been defeated.
- Updated the description on the moonrock sword to better reflect how its lighting effect actually works.
- AI units no longer try to get quite as close to you.
- Bait fish can no longer be caught with other bait fish.
- Added new items.
- Added a new boss.
- Added a number of options in the main menu screen.
